MergeResults.query: select "SOMTerritoryId", "Role", "Status", "SOMUserId" from STATIC."OMAdjudicationUserAssignment" where "OMAdjudicationId" = '{{Adjudication.Id}}' order by "Role"

select a."Name",a."Type", ar."OMAdjudicationId", ar."SOMTerritoryId", ar."Source", ar."OMAccountId", ar."Action", ar."SOMEngagementSegmentId", ar."Targets", ar."CalculatedSegmentId", ar."Reason",t."Name" "Terr" from static."OMAdjudication" a join static."OMAccountAdjudicationResult" ar on ar."OMAdjudicationId" = a."Id" join static."OMAdjudicationTerritory" ad on ad."OMAdjudicationId" = a."Id" join {{schema}}."OMTerritory" t on t."SOMTerritoryId" = ar."SOMTerritoryId" where a."Name" in ('{{Adjudication.Name}}') and ar."AccessKey" in (ad."AccessKeyRep", ad."AccessKeyApprover") and ar."AccessKey" = ad."AccessKeyRep" order by ar."OMAccountId"

select a."Name",a."Type", ar."OMAdjudicationId", ar."SOMTerritoryId", ar."Source", ar."OMAccountId", ar."Action", ar."SOMEngagementSegmentId", ar."Targets", ar."CalculatedSegmentId", ar."Reason",t."Name" "Terr" from static."OMAdjudication" a join static."OMAccountAdjudicationResult" ar on ar."OMAdjudicationId" = a."Id" join static."OMAdjudicationTerritory" ad on ad."OMAdjudicationId" = a."Id" join {{schema}}."OMTerritory" t on t."SOMTerritoryId" = ar."SOMTerritoryId" where a."Name" in ('{{Adjudication.Name}}') and ar."AccessKey" in (ad."AccessKeyRep", ad."AccessKeyApprover") and ar."AccessKey" = ad."AccessKeyApprover" order by ar."OMAccountId"

select a."Name" "adjuName" ,a."Type", g."Code", t."Name" "terrName", ar."OMAdjudicationId", ar."SOMGeographyId", ar."SOMTerritoryId", ar."Action" from static."OMAdjudication" a join static."OMGeographyAdjudicationResult" ar on ar."OMAdjudicationId" = a."Id" join static."OMAdjudicationTerritory" ad on ad."OMAdjudicationId" = a."Id" join static."OMGeography" g on g."SOMGeographyId" = ar."SOMGeographyId" join {{schema}}."OMTerritory"t on t."SOMTerritoryId" = ad."SOMTerritoryId" where a."Name" in ('{{Adjudication.Name}}') and ar."AccessKey" in (ad."AccessKeyRep", ad."AccessKeyApprover") and ar."AccessKey" = ad."AccessKeyRep" order by a."Name"
